ActBorrowing Authority Act, 1996-97
Financial Administration Act
PrecisAuthority to raise funds over the course of Fiscal Year 2004-2005 by way of the issue and sale of Government of Canada securities or other instruments such as Treasury Bills and Treasury Notes.
